structure.unit: LEVEES, DRAINAGE, AND RECLAMATION OF LANDS
MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS AS TO DITCHES, DRAINAGE, AND RECLAMATION

law.catch_line: Continuation of drainage corporations -- To have benefit of this law.
law.text: Any corporation heretofore existing for the purpose of improving the public health by draining swamp land or lands which need drainage to make them more suitable for cultivation, shall be continued in force for those objects and purposes and shall have the benefit of KRS 269.120 to 269.230.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2417a-1.
